resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4239</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Goldilocks and the Three bears</string>
            <string language="es">Ricitos dorados y los tres osos</string>
            <string language="ga">Cinnín Óir  and the Three bears</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Goldilocks und die drei Bären</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Goldilocks et les trois ours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Goldilocks e os três ursos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Goldilocks ed i tre orsi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Goldilocks και τα τρία αντέχουν</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Goldilocks using Lamh and ICT.  Lámh signs and key words are emphasised. Activity is reinforced using "My World " software.  This activity is suitable for Moderate / Severe pupils. Students in the Mild range might attempt the more advanced tasks like writing.</string>
            <string language="es">Ricitos dorados utiliza el lenguaje de signos Lámh e ICT. Se enfatizan los signos del lenguaje Lámh y las palabras clave. La actividad es reforzada utilizando el software “My World”. Esta actividad es apropiada para los alumnos del nivel moderado/severo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cinnín Óir  ag úsáid Lamh agus ICT. Cuirtear béim ar chomhartaí Lámh agus eochairfhocail. Treisítear an ghníomhaíocht trí bogearraí “My World” a úsáid. Tá an ghníonmhaíocht seo feiliúnach do dhaltaí Measarthach / Dona. B’fhéidir go ndéanfadh daltaí sa réi</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Goldilocks, Lamh und ICT verwendend. Lámh 
Zeichen und Schlüsselwörter werden hervorgehoben. Aktivität 
wird mit "meine Welt" Software verstärkt. Diese Aktivität ist 
für die gemäßigten/strengen Pupillen verwendbar. 
Kursteilnehmer in der milden Strecke konnten die 
hochentwickelteren Aufgaben wie Schreiben versuchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Goldilocks en utilisant Lamh et ICT. Des 
signes de Lámh et les mots clés sont soulignés. L'activité 
est renforcée en utilisant le logiciel du "mon monde". Cette 
activité convient à pupilles modérées/graves. Les étudiants
dans l'intervalle doux pourraient essayer le plus avançé 
charge comme l'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Goldilocks usando Lamh e ICT. Os sinais de 
Lámh e as palavras chaves são emfatizados. A atividade é 
reforçada usando do "o software meu mundo". Esta atividade é 
apropriada para pupilas moderadas/severas. Os estudantes na 
escala suave puderam tentar as tarefas mais avançadas como a escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Goldilocks usando Lamh ed ICT. I segni di 
Lámh e le parole chiave sono dati risalto a. L'attività è 
rinforzata usando "il software del mio mondo". Questa attività 
è adatta pupille moderate/severe. Gli allievi nella gamma 
delicata potrebbero tentare le mansioni più avanzate come scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Goldilocks χρησιμοποιώντας Lamh και τις ICT. 
Τα σημάδια Lαmh και οι βασικές λέξεις υπογραμμίζονται. 
Η δραστηριότητα ενισχύεται χρησιμοποιώντας το λογισμικό των 
"κόσμων μου". Αυτή η δραστηριότητα είναι κατάλληλη για τους
μέτριους/αυστηρούς μαθητές. Οι σπουδαστές στην ήπια σειρά 
να προσπαθήσουν τις πιό προηγμένες στοιχειώδεις εργασίες όπως το
γράψιμο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
